MethReg 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Map regions and target genes

get_region_target_gene()

Obtain target genes of input regions

Map regions and TFs

get_tf_in_region()

Get human TFs for regions by scanning it with motifmatchr using JASPAR 2020 database

Interaction model

interaction_model()

Fits linear models with interaction to triplet data (Target, TF, DNAm), where DNAm can be a continuous variable (for all samples) or a binary variable (samples in Q1 or Q4)

Stratified model

stratified_model()

Fits linear models to triplet data (Target, TF, DNAm) for samples with high DNAm or low DNAm separately, and annotates TF (activator/repressor, methyl-plus/methyl-minus).

Plot

plot_interaction_model()

Plot interaction model results

plot_stratified_model()

Plot stratified model results

Controlling confounding effects

get_residuals()

Get residuals from regression model

Auxiliary functions

make_se_from_dnam_probes()

Transform DNA methylation array into a summarized Experiment object

make_se_from_dnam_regions()

Transform DNA methylation array into a summarized Experiment object

make_se_from_gene_matrix()

Transform gene expression matrix into a Summarized Experiment object

Contents
